A98003-d-06-30-98-WTJR.Narrative: UNION PACIFIC TRAIN #LBB63-30 WAS PULLING 76 LOADS AND 14 EMPTIES FROM WTJ YARD USING 8 LOCOMOTIVES(21,000 HP).  THE 44TH CAR IN THE CONSIST DERAILED AS WELL AS THE FOLLOWING 3 CARS.  DURING THE JOINT INSPECTION OF THE DERAILMENT THE UNION PACIFIC CONDUCTOR STATED TO OUR MANAGER OF OPERATIONS THATHE WAS IN A HURRY AND TRYING TO LEAVE TOO QUICKLY.  POOR TRAIN HANDLING CAUSED EXCESSIVE SLACK AND BUFFING WHICH CAUSED THE DERAILMENT.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone

G4345-d-06-14-98-WC.Narrative: WC YARD JOB-FY0492, CONSISTING OF 1 LOCOMOTIVE AND 19 EMPTIES WAS IN THE PROCESS OF THEIR SWITCHINGDUTIES ON UNION PACIFIC'S YARD TRACK IN WISCONSIN RAPIDS.  THE CONDUCTOR HAD STOPPED THE MOVEMENT SHORT OF THE WC TIE-UP SWITCH TO CHECK FOR ALIGNMENT AND THOUGHT THAT THE SWITCH WAS PROPERLY LINED.HE THEN INSTRUCTED THE ENGINEER TO SHOVE BACK INTO A CLEAR TRACK.  THE CONDUCTOR WAS RIDING THE POINT OF THE SHOVE WHEN THE TRAIN WENT INTO EMERGENCY AND STOPPED.  THE CONDUCTOR THEN WALKED TOWARDS THE HEAD END TO FIND CARS ON THE GROUND.  THE SWITCH HAD NOT BEEN LINED PROPERLY FOR THEIR MOVE CAUSING CARS TO RUN THROUGH THE SWITCH AND DERAIL DURING THE SHOVE MOVE.  WHEN THE 3 CARS IN FY0492 DERAILED, THEY ALSO CAUSED A LOADEDED CAR ON TRACK  #1 TO BECOME DERAILED.  THIS CAR WAS PART OF A STANDING CUT OF APPROXIMATELY 10 CARS.  A SWITCH OWNED AND MAINTAINED BY WISCONSIN CENTRAL LTD. WAS ALSO DAMAGED IN THIS INCIDENT EVEN THOUGH THE TRACK THAT THE DERAILMENT OCCURRED ON IS OWNED AND MAINTAINEDBY THE UNION PACIFIC.NoneNoneNoneNone

G4348-d-06-08-98-WC.Narrative: TRAIN, L013-08, WAS SWITCHING THEIR TRAIN IN THE BRADLEY YARD ON THE NEW MAIN TRACK.  THE CREW WAS IN THE PROCESS OF PUTTING THEIR TRAIN TOGETHER WHEN THE TRAIN WAS STOPPED OVER THE OLD MAIN SWITCH AND THE CONDUCTOR THREW THE SWITCH UNDER THE TRAIN INSTEAD OF JUST LOCKING IT FOR THEIR MOVE.  WHEN THEY SHOVED BACK TO THE REST OF THEIR TRAIN, THEY DERAILED 3 CARS IN THEIR TRAIN WHICH IN TURN STRUCKAND DERAILED 1 CAR AND CORNERED ANOTHER CAR SITTING ON ADJACENT YARD TRACKS.  THIS INCIDENT TOOK PLACE WITHIN THE YARD DURING SWITCHING OPERATIONS.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone
